list.name: Default
list.comment: + Added Rhys's HA-2 and Testme classes ~ Added Rhys's changes to Server and Client to work with threads ~ Added my changes to Server to store usernames and passwords + usernames.txt + passwords.txt

task.summary: ~ Made changes to keygen to take in hardcoded values as per demonstrator recommendation + Added DESencryptor and made a start on encrypting data using keys genereated in DESkeygen (up to extension in functionF)
~ improvements to keygen up to generating fk1
~ changes to DESencryptor and DESmain to accept a plaintext string and output encrypted bytes at the end
~ client and server now relatively up and running, need to add some sort of loop to detect if there is a response from the server ~ clarity changes to encryptor
